name: poll
description: Creates a poll for the server to vote on

options.name: question
options.description: The question for the people to vote on

options.name: choice1
options.description: The first option for the poll

options.name: choice2
options.description: The second option for the poll

options.name: time
options.description: Duration of the poll in hours, will default to 1 if not specified

options.name: choice3
options.description: The third option for the poll

options.name: choice4
options.description: The fourth option for the poll

options.name: choice5
options.description: The fifth option for the poll

options.name: choice6
options.description: The sixth option for the poll

options.name: choice7
options.description: The seventh option for the poll

options.name: choice8
options.description: The eighth option for the poll
